snippet.title: Ghosts and Bureaucracy - Trailer
snippet.description:
Explore the ruins of an abandoned government building, collect items, learn a multitude of skills, interact with a variety of objects and enjoy individual and absurd dialogues, engage in Undertale inspired battles of persuasions with ghostly politicians and clerks and try to request a treasure.

Created with a lot of passion and tears by students of Media University Stuttgart ("Hochschule der Medien") in the bachelor degree program Computer Science and Media.

Please wishlist the game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1245440/Ghosts_and_Bureaucracy/

Credits:
Kira Wanjek (Programming, Project Management, Writing)
Linard Hug (Programming)
Lena Jordan (Art)
Athina Reißenweber (Additional Art)
Alexander Schimanko (Sound Design)
Tobias Brendel (Sound Design)
